alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 06 at 3:59AM EDT until October 06 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys, mainly on the Bay side. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
